quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: The real destroyer of the liberties of the people is he who spreads among them bounties, donations and benefits.
author: Plutarch

quote: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
author: John Bunyan

quote: Donation for the blind. A fee for falling into their own trap.
author: Andre Dawson

quote: The proper aim of giving is to put the recipients in a state where they no longer need our gifts.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: It is more difficult to give money away intelligently than to earn it in the first place.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
author: St. Francis

quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.
author: Eckhart Tolle
